card.name: Lord of Atlantis
card.property: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator
card.property: Flying Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, you create a Treasure token for each opponent dealt damage. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Bridge from Below
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

card.name: Mephidross Vampire
card.property: Flying Each creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

card.name: Pitiless Plunderer
card.property: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Breeches, Brazen Plunderer
card.property: Menace Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, exile the top card of each of those opponents' libraries. You may play those cards this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Dargo, the Shipwrecker
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way and {2} less to cast for each other artifact or creature you've sacrificed this turn. Trample Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Rampaging Ferocidon
card.property: Menace Players can't gain life. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Underworld Breach
card.property: Each nonland card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Underworld Breach.

card.name: Carnage Tyrant
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Trample, hexproof

card.name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
card.property: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control. Trample

card.name: Polyraptor
card.property: Enrage — Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of Polyraptor.

card.name: Kalamax, the Stormsire
card.property: Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if Kalamax, the Stormsire is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.

card.name: Lord Windgrace
card.property: +2: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card. −3: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. −11: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk. Lord Windgrace can be your commander.

card.name: Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist
card.property: First strike Whenever Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat. As long as Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.

card.name: Thrasios, Triton Hero
card.property: {4}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, draw a card. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Star Compass
card.property: Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.

card.name: Ghostly Prison
card.property: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

card.name: Fabricate
card.property: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Show and Tell
card.property: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Tragic Slip
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Victimize
card.property: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Gamble
card.property: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

card.name: Crashing Footfalls
card.property: Suspend 4—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.) Create two 4/4 green Rhino creature tokens with trample.

card.name: Tireless Tracker
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on Tireless Tracker.

card.name: Drown in the Loch
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard. • Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

card.name: Field of the Dead
card.property: Field of the Dead enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. Whenever Field of the Dead or another land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands with different names, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Stoneforge Mystic
card.property: When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Brazen Borrower
card.property: Flash Flying Brazen Borrower can block only creatures with flying.

alternate.name: Petty Theft
alternate.property: Return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Desertion
card.property: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Morbid Opportunist
card.property: Whenever one or more other creatures die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Port Razer
card.property: Whenever Port Razer deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Port Razer can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.

card.name: Scapeshift
card.property: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Mystic Snake
card.property: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

card.name: Notion Thief
card.property: Flash If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Desert
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.

card.name: Prismatic Vista
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Prismatic Vista: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Thought-Knot Seer
card.property: ({C} represents colorless mana.) When Thought-Knot Seer enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card. When Thought-Knot Seer leaves the battlefield, target opponent draws a card.

card.name: Prismatic Ending
card.property: Converge — Exile target nonland permanent if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

card.name: Dismember
card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

card.name: Persist
card.property: Return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Expressive Iteration
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.

card.name: Solitude
card.property: Flash Lifelink When Solitude enters the battlefield, exile up to one other target creature. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power. Evoke—Exile a white card from your hand.

card.name: Subtlety
card.property: Flash Flying When Subtlety enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature spell or planeswalker spell. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Evoke—Exile a blue card from your hand.

card.name: Grief
card.property: Menace When Grief enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Evoke—Exile a black card from your hand.

card.name: Fury
card.property: Double strike When Fury enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers. Evoke—Exile a red card from your hand.

card.name: Endurance
card.property: Flash Reach When Endurance enters the battlefield, up to one target player puts all the cards from their graveyard on the bottom of their library in a random order. Evoke—Exile a green card from your hand.

card.name: Solitude
card.property: Flash Lifelink When Solitude enters the battlefield, exile up to one other target creature. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power. Evoke—Exile a white card from your hand.

card.name: Subtlety
card.property: Flash Flying When Subtlety enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature spell or planeswalker spell. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Evoke—Exile a blue card from your hand.

card.name: Grief
card.property: Menace When Grief enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Evoke—Exile a black card from your hand.

card.name: Fury
card.property: Double strike When Fury enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers. Evoke—Exile a red card from your hand.

card.name: Endurance
card.property: Flash Reach When Endurance enters the battlefield, up to one target player puts all the cards from their graveyard on the bottom of their library in a random order. Evoke—Exile a green card from your hand.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Ledger Shredder
card.property: Flying Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, Ledger Shredder connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Rat Colony
card.property: Rat Colony gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control. A deck can have any number of cards named Rat Colony.

card.name: Relentless Rats
card.property: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

card.name: Kindred Charge
card.property: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sylvan Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

card.name: Toski, Bearer of Secrets
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Indestructible Toski, Bearer of Secrets attacks each combat if able. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Frogmite
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

card.name: Sword of Fire and Ice
Secluded Courtyard
card.property: As Secluded Courtyard enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type or activate an ability of a creature source of the chosen type.

card.name: Collected Company
card.property: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
